hero.title: E-Declaration
hero.subtitle: Digital Tax Declaration and Compliance Solutions
hero.description: Accelerate your tax declaration processes, eliminate manual errors and ensure full legal compliance. ESM E-Declaration enables the preparation, validation and secure electronic submission of all tax declarations to the Turkish Revenue Administration (TRA). With its automated data integration, it removes repetitive manual entries and provides centralized management of all tax filings.

overview.title: Why Choose E-Declaration?
overview.description: E-Declaration modernizes tax processes by increasing accuracy, speed and compliance. ESM E-Declaration unifies all declaration types on a single platform, performing automatic validations to prevent errors before submission. Fully integrated with ERP and financial systems, it ensures your declarations are complete, compliant and delivered on time.

benefits: Submits tax declarations electronically with speed and accuracy
Eliminates manual data entry and repetitive tasks
Fully compliant with TRA systems and standards
Automates approval, monitoring and reporting workflows
Integrates seamlessly with ERP and accounting platforms

features.title: Automated Declaration Preparation
features.description: Retrieves data directly from financial systems and converts it into the required format. Saves time and ensures data accuracy.

features.title: Compliance and Security
features.description: Fully aligned with national tax authority regulations. All declarations are digitally signed and securely transmitted.

features.title: Integration and Automation
features.description: Connects directly with ERP and finance systems. Streamlines declaration workflows and minimizes human error.

features.title: Reporting and Traceability
features.description: All submitted declarations can be tracked through a unified dashboard. Reports and approval histories are easily accessible for review.
